mapper.sql: point_id, np_customer_point.customer_id,customer_username, point_detail, point_type, point, np_customer_point.create_time, np_customer_point.del_flag
mapper.select:
select
from np_customer_point inner join np_customer c on c.customer_id=np_customer_point.customer_id where np_customer_point.del_flag ='0' order by np_customer_point.create_time desc limit #{startRowNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{endRowNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select ,enter.company_name , c.customer_nickname from np_customer_point inner join np_customer c on c.customer_id=np_customer_point.customer_id left join qp_enterprise_certification_info enter on enter.customerId = np_customer_point.customer_id and enter.check_status='1' AND enter.del_flag='0' where np_customer_point.del_flag = '0' and
c.customer_username like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{customerUsername}),'%') and
c.customer_id= #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and
np_customer_point.create_time between #{createTime} and #{createTimeTo} and
np_customer_point.create_time > #{createTime} and
np_customer_point.create_time < #{createTimeTo} and
1=1 order by np_customer_point.create_time desc limit #{startRowNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{endRowNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select count(1) from np_customer_point where del_flag = '0'

select count(1) from np_customer_point inner join np_customer c on c.customer_id=np_customer_point.customer_id where np_customer_point.del_flag = '0' and
c.customer_username like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{customerUsername}),'%') and
c.customer_id= #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and
np_customer_point.create_time between #{createTime} and #{createTimeTo} and
np_customer_point.create_time > #{createTime} and
np_customer_point.create_time < #{createTimeTo} and
1=1
